title: 400 minutes monthly
info:
400 minutes for 30 days  For the price of 120 Afghanis. 
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. 
Send 120 to activate and d120 to 555 to deactivate

title: 1000 minutes per month
info:
1000 minutes on Roshan for 30 days at the price of 200 Afghanis Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. Along with unlimited messages 
To activate 220 and to deactivate send d220 to 555

title: 1500 minutes monthly

To activate  Press the green button and press the red button to deactivate.
Send 225 to activate and send d225 to 555 to deactivate
